Name: Ravi
Title: They should have forbearance
Review: Temple is excellent and very clean, no doubt about that, and i have visited lot of times, but the pandits behavior in temple will be always impolite and insulting.

Name: Kasi  Venkoba R
Title: Pride of Hyderabad
Review: Though I have  visited this temple many times earlier, the present visit is an importance one as the visit was on Vaikunta Ekadasi day which comes once in a year. On this auspicious day the entry into the temple will be from Uttara Dwaram, meaning from North entrance.  The temple is fully decorated with different flowers, fruits etc giving a great Look.The Utsava Moorthy of Lord Vishnu and Goddess Lakshmi is kept outside the sanctorium and poojais performed there.  A big crowd is seen standing in the queues since morning to have a Darshan of Goddess Mahalakshmi and Lord Vishnu.Another attraction in the temple is erecting Mirror Mahal inside the temple which is so beautiful to admire.  A must visit temple in Hyderabad and it has become the Pride of Hyderabad

Name: panii2015
Title: Namo Lakshmi Namo Namaha
Review: All the lakshmi temples on one place. Very neat clean maintenance. Widely available parking area. Very calm and spiritual place in city. Every one should visit this. Should appreciate the maintenance of the committee.

Name: CuriousTraveller
Title: Most beautiful and peaceful temple
Review: It is the most beautiful and peaceful city. We always used to visit this temple to take presence. There is a lot of development in the temple.You must take your family especially with parents.

Name: Kumar
Title: Temple visit
Review: Temple is clean. Deities alankaram are beautiful and give calmness&satisfaction of visiting. Your wishes will be fulfilled.

Name: sree143in
Title: must visit
Review: One the Good and very famous temple in hyd is Asthalakshmi tempel. goddess lakshmi in this tempel will give blessings to all.

Name: Manu
Title: Best Lakshmi Devi temple in Hyderabad
Review: I am a regular visitor to Ashta Lakshmi temple in Hyderabad. Its maintnance is admirable and we see all 8 avatars of Lakshmi Devi. But in 2019 it has raised ticket prices drastically. Last year(2018) I spent Rs.101 for Vahana Pooja(T/W) on Dussehra but in 2019 it is increased to Rs 251 and more over poojari who performed vahanapooja demanded Rs.101 and servents Rs. 50. Poojari shouted at a man who gave him Rs. 50 as he didnt give 101 and insulted him throwing that Rs. 50 to a Cleaner. My point is people go to temple with a peaceful mind to get the blessings of godess and the Priest. But if a priest behaves with devotees like this it hurt them a lot and creates negetive impression on it's commercial side. On top of it this Priest had pan masala also. I would ask management to look into it and protect people religious sentiments especially on special occations. Regards,Manohar

Name: idea614354
Title: Laxmi amma
Review: This temple is very famous with astha lakshmi ammavari darshan, very familiar with local people also.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: 6 godess temple
Review: only temple with 6 goddesses in Hyderabad called astalakshmi temple , well maintained and nice place to visit for peaceful time

Name: Shabeshan
Title: Great Temple
Review: one the best and clean temple in hyderabad. the santity and the divine blessings are the great in the temple. one should try to visit it.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Nice place.
Review: These days very many religious activities take pace here along with social activities at this temple dedicated to ASTA LAKSHMI (Goddess of wealth in eight forms).Its closed from noon till 4pm. avoid  festival days when there is heavy rush.

Name: MSR
Title: Ashtalakshmi Temple, Green Hills colony, HYB
Review: One of the famous religious places in Hyderabad and very familiar in Dilshuknagar and LB nagar locale. A well organized temple with beautiful temple premises, organized shopping complex and neat roads around. Even parking and a open air-theater opposite to this temple where several religious events are at common sight very often. This temple is located is densely populated residential area but well organized. Consequent to introduction of Hyderabad Metro Rail network, this temple is having walk-able distance from Chaitanyapuri Metro station on LB nagar- Miyapur stretch.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Very nice
Review: Very nice temple, neet and clean place, temple of Maa Lakshmi, must visit whenever you are in Hyderabad.

Name: deepa v
Title: Temple
Review: Temple is dedicated to goddess Lakshmi with her eight forms. It's neat clean and well maintained..Must visit in hyd

Name: srinath18
Title: Jai ambe maata
Review: Located at main road from dilsukhnagar to lbnagar area one of the most old temple in Hyderabad..Jai ambe maata ki jai

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Must visit place
Review: This place has got its best natured and best peaceful place to step in and have a peaceful mind and its calmness.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: clean temple but avoid going in the afternoon
Review: must visit temple in hyderabad but for me it took me more than 2 hours to get there from my location and i suggest you avoid going in the afternoon on a sunny day unless you have some special rituals such as special pooja, or an offering because the sun could easily heat up the marbles and you cant wear footwear inside the temple so it's gonna burn your foot so keep this in mind

Name: RajaSekar M
Title: Clean Temple and Darshan is awesome
Review: Ashtalakshmi temples is simple and very clean. Rush free for darshan. Bought laddus and puliyodhara at affordable price. Peaceful place for people to burst their stress. Note: Coconuts needs to be cracked by yourself in the below before going upstairs.

Name: Tapas_Baripada
Title: Nice temple
Review: It is a nice temple with very good parking facility. The main deities are Narayana and Adi Lakshmi. Other seven form of Lakshmi, viz. Santana, Gaja, Dhana, Dhanya, Vijaya, Aishwarya, Veera are on the peripheri. There is also a Ganesha idol at the entrance. Prasad of pulihara and laddu, available at the prasad counter are good. There is a lift for senior citizens as the temple is on the first floor.

Name: idea614354
Title: amma krupa
Review: this a very famous temple in hyderabad, good place to visit, powerful god believes all here. a lot of people visits

Name: idea614354
Title: all lakshmi's
Review: Temple a peaceful place good construction, nice architecture take amma vari darshan and blessing at here.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good
Review: This is one of the noted temples dedicated to  goddess laksmi  near LB Nagar area. Recently this has become a center for religious , community and social  activities.

Name: Srinivas S
Title: Peaceful temple
Review: At one place, you get to get to visit and pray Astalakshmi. Temple is peaceful and nice ambiance. It's one of the famous Astalakshmi temples in Hyderabad.

Name: Manish K
Title: Nice peaceful temple to visit
Review: The Ashtalakshmi temple is dedicated to eight forms of the Goddess Lakshmi and is a popular religious centre in the eastern part of Hyderabad. The place offers good parking facilities.Though a small complex, it is nonetheless a peaceful place, where one can visit and spend some quiet moments in prayer. The prasadam given is delicious and one must partake of it. The temple is closed during the afternoon hours and is open during the morning and evening, so one needs to find out the timings before paying it a visit.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Holy shrine
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple provides a tranquil environment to pray and worship. The premises is very neatly maintained.

Name: rishitha g
Title: Temple review
Review: One of the Best temple's in hyderabad to visit.bathukamma,navarathri,brahmothsavam are celebrated very well.here you can have world's best pulihora prasadam:)

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: One of its Kind in the State
Review: Ashta Lakshmi Temple, located at Vasavi colony, Kothapet, between Dilsukhnagar & L B Nagar is one of its kind in the state of Telangana. The main deity is Mahalakshmi sametha Srimannarayana, This is located on a small hill top.As we enter the temple, we climb a few steps to reach Lord Vinayaka and after taking blessing from this Lord, we proceed to the main temple. At the centre, we witness Goddess Mahalakshmi along with Srimannarayana. Within this we find the other seven Lakshmi, making it in all Ashta lakshmi.The temple follows Agamana sastra and is under the control of Sri Kanchi Kamakoti Peetham. The temple has a separate Managing committee headed by its Chairman.The annual Brahmotsavam is celebrated in a grand scale in the month of Vaisakha, April/ May. Thousands of devotees from all over twin cities and other places visit tis temple during this period. Annadanam is done during these seven days both in the afternoon and night.Goddess Lakshmi is crowned with Golden saree and Lord Srimannarayana with Golden Dhoti on all important festival days and during the Brahmotsavam. Its a feast to the eyes to grace the Deities decorated in Golden saree and dhoti.Recently the temple has introduced Sahasra Deepa alankaran which is celebrated every Friday at 7.00 PM. Every friday, anna prasadam is distributed to the devotees.The Management is doing wonderful services to the temple by introducing many Pooja and other devotional programs. The devotees are ever increasing for every festival occassion to have darshan of Mahalakshmi and to get blessed.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Beautifully Decorated on Vaikunta Ekadasi
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple located at Vasavi colony, between Dilsukhnagar and L B Nagar, Hyderabad is one of its kind in twin cites. The main deity is Lord Srimannarayana and His consort Goddess Mahalakshmi, surrounded by other seven deities namely. Santana Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhaanya Lakshmi, Ishwarya lakshmi, Vijaya Lakshmi and Veera Lakshmi, thus making it  Asthalakshmi temple.This temple is on a small hillock, gives a valiant look. The management has made many improvements for the benefit of devotees. A lift is now provided for disabled and senior citizens. They have recently introduced Sahasra Deepa Alankarana Seva on every Friday at 7.00 PM. It is a feast to to eyes to witness this seva.The temple is offering Anna Danam from 12.30 pm to 2.30 pm on every Friday. Hundreds of devotees come and enjoy the food which is so tasty.I visited this temple on 29th December 2017 which happened to be Vaikunta Ekadasi. Elaborate arrangements were made for this auspicious day where the Uttara Dwaram was opened and entree to the temple is from this door. This is a special occasion. The entire temple is decorated with flowers. The main deity Lord Srimannarayana is donned with Golden Dhoti and Goddess Mahalakshmi with Golden Saree. It was really a feast to the eyes to see such a beautiful decoration.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: WORTH VISITING
Review: ASHTA LAKSHMI,  Eight forms of goddess Lakshmi (Goddess of wealth) situated in Kothapeta, Near Vijayawada highway is very famous for its socio religious activities which are regularly organised.

Name: koteswararao
Title: vvgood temple
Review: this is Vv good temple which is in Hyderabad   on top of a small  hill  all puja is good  to all devi structures

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Very good temple
Review: Well maintained temple. Lakshmi temple with eight different forms of goddess Lakshmi. Cool and calm place.  Divine place.

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Nice Temple
Review: It is situated in Kothapet,Dilshuknagar,Hyderabad. More Super Market is one of the landmark if u want to go there. You will see a big kaman and need to walk for 5 minutes.It is a temple of 8 Lakshmies called Ashtalakshmi.At entrance there will be 30 steps,after that Ganesh temple appears.In main an idol of Sridevi,Bhudevi sametha Lakshmi Narayana is in middle of these 8 Lakshmi idols,which are very beautiful.Kumkum Archana is actually being preferred. Do visit this temple with family.

Name: guddu1954
Title: nicely maintained temple
Review: The temple is ideally located in vasavi colony kothapet,on an inner road but easily identifiable.It has smaller temples of eight goddesses of wealth,within its vast premises.

Name: GayathriSharma
Title: Peaceful Location
Review: It is situated in Kothapet,Dilshuknagar,Hyderabad.It is a temple of 8 Lakshmies called Ashtalakshmi.At entrance there will be 30 steps,after that Ganesh temple appears.In main an idol of Sridevi,Bhudevi sametha Lakshmi Narayana is in middle of these 8 Lakshmi idols,which are very beautiful.Kumkum Archana is prefferable here.Goshala is opposite to main temple.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: Unique temple with all the Lakshmis
Review: This is a well-known and cute little temple. One can take darshan of Lord Vishnu and Lakshmi and all around them, the ashta lakshmis are seated. The Ganpati here is grand and beautiful too.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: One of the two temples to have all the 8 Lakshmis
Review: Only Chennai and Hyderabad have temples with all the 8 Lakshmis. It is a small temple, but well-maintained. Generally crowded on Sundays, it is a must visit while at Hyderabad.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: 8 lakshmi temple
Review: asthalakshmi temple is with 8 goddesses the best temple in Hyderabad for maatha pooja to darshan all 8 goddesses .

Name: vlsvas
Title: Visit to Ashtalakshmi Temple, Kothapet, Dilsukh Nagar, Hyderabad
Review: Ashtalakshmi Temple is very famous temple of Goddess Lakshmi Maa, is located between Dilsukh Nagar and LB Nagar. At this temple we can observe eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi: Adilakshmi, Aishwaryalakshmi, Santanalakshmi, Dhanalakshmi, Dhanyalakshmi, Gajalakshmi, Vijayalakshmi, and Varalakshmi.  with small inner temples. This temple is maintained neat, peaceful and has a good premises with wide area for parking, prasada distribution.Ashtalakshmi temple was modelled based on the one at Chennai.The Rajagopuram of this temple is intricately carved with beautiful designs that catches the eyes of the visitors. Kalyana Mandapam (Marriage hall) also built near to the temple Durga Navratri is the most celebrated festival in this temple.It is a good peaceful place to visit by every one to blessed by Maa Lakshmi.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Temple of Ma Lakshmi
Review: This is the temple of Ma lakshmi, this temple is very beautiful and well maintained. Nice place to visit.

Name: Sravan Kumar K
Title: Ashta Lakshmi ammavari temple
Review: This temple is located in Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad. It is good temple to visit. This temple is having Lord Srimannarayana and Ashta Lakshmi ammavaru... the garbha gudi is surrounded by 8 Lakhmi devi temples... Adi Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhanya Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi,, Santana Lakshmi, Dhairya Lakshmi, Vijaya Lakshmi, Vidya Lakshmi.The bad experience was the management... We visited on first Friday of Shravana madam... Which is an auspicious month for ladies. There was a huge crowd, but the queue is not been managed properly... It is a wide queue and people had to push each other during darshan. Otherwise it is a good temple to have a peace of mind.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Well maintained.
Review: Worth visiting and spending some time here famous for its spirituality dedicated to GODDESS LAKSHMI.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Well maintained and nice temple.
Review: This is one of the well maintained by the community dedicated to Goddess LAKSHMI in Kothapeta, near MORE HYPER MART on  LB Nagar (Vijayawada highway). WORTH VISITING.Many spiritual  /  religious activitied are conducted regularly..

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Lakshmi Temple in City
Review: Could see all godess Lakshmi's here. Neatly maintained and well planned construction. Ample parking place opp to temple.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Famous Temple
Review: This is a very famous temple in Hyderabad. Very peaceful when you go there. Gets little crowded on weekends.

Name: vijayagopal
Title: Unique temple
Review: One of the few temples ul find with ashta laxmis. A very well maintained temple with peaceful ambience. A must visit.

Name: sudha966
Title: Ashtalakshmi temple
Review: It is near kothapet.  very neatly maintained in a residential colony.  A peaceful atmosphere.  feel peaceful and happy when we visit this temple

Name: Manish K
Title: Good and clean place of worship
Review: The Ashtalakshmi Temple is dedicated to eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi and is very popular among devotees and visitors alike. A nice temple, with eye-catching carvings and very tasty prasadam, it is a nice place to spend some quiet moments in prayer. This temple has very good facilities for parking, but what really stood out for me was how spotlessly clean it was kept by the management. Do take note of the opening and closing times before visiting as it's closed during the afternoon.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of temle
Review: very big and famous temple in dilsuknagar to nagole road, the god is very famous, it is one of the famours

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of asthalakashmi temple
Review: The one and only big Asthalakshmi temple in hyderabad and its near to diluskunagar. Very famous temple

Name: annejang
Title: A quiet spiritual place
Review: The temple is very popular among the local devotees here. Laxmi, the goddess of prosperity and her 8 different incarnations are worshiped here. Each incarnation in charge of different blessing ranging from money to fertility The temple is filled with many devotees calmly worshiping and praying for their inner most desires. The temple has a small pool with turtles and beautiful ornate mandalas. One must remove shoes before entering the temple and once can buy delicious prasad for very minimal amount.

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Nice temple!!!
Review: The temple is famous for goddess lakshmi and temple had sannidanams of 8 different lakshmi. Dress restriction is there in the temple. The goddess is very powerful and worthy visit on friday.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Lakshmi Temple's in Hyd
Review: This is one of the best Lakshmi temple in Hyderabad. I am a regular visitor to this place and especially during Navratri festival.

Name: Siddhartha C
Title: Nice temple, peaceful place
Review: Amazing temple with ample parking.Not commercialised and retains the spiritual aspect.Well maintained and clean.Note - during festival times, the queue would be long with wait of around 1 hour.

Name: yojanaredd
Title: place of spirituality
Review: the temple is famous for goddess lakshmi which people believe it as very powerfull and there is a dress restriction in this temple you have to wear only traditional dresses with dupatta

Name: lankavignesh
Title: 8 lakshmi temple
Review: it is one of the best peaceful temple where it contains 8 different types of lakshmi.i recommend to visit this temple on friday.

Name: bhogavillifamily
Title: Friday visit of this temple is really a holy soulness
Review: The temple is well organized and well maintained and the prasad particular don't miss when visiting this temple.Be blessed

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Ashtalakshmi temple
Review: astalakshmi temple is very beautiful and powerfull temple in hyderabad.every one have to visit this temple at least once.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Goddess Lakshmi Temple
Review: Ashat lakshmi temple is dedicated to eight forms of Sri Lakshmi who are the symbols of power,health and wealth.The idols of Lakshmi in eight different postures are installed in the chief gopuram of the temple.All the idols inside the chief gopuram are decorated with jewels made of gold and pearl.

Name: chandrasg
Title: 8 forms of wealth and prosperity
Review: you can have a good darshan of goddess lakshmi in all of her 8 forms in this temple. you can feel very much blessed when you go there. early morning is very peaceful and no rush.

Name: mayuriams
Title: 8 types of lakshmi's
Review: Adi Lakshmi (Sanskrit: आदि लक्ष्मी, Ādi Lakṣmī, "Primeval Lakshmi") or Maha Lakshmi (Sanskrit: महा लक्ष्मी, Mahā Lakṣmī, "Great Lakshmi") : an ancient form of Lakshmi[3] and incarnation of Lakshmi as daughter of the sage Bhrigu.[2]Dhana Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धन लक्ष्मी, Dhana Lakṣmī, "Money Lakshmi"): for money and gold [3]Dhanya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धान्य लक्ष्मी, Dhǎnya Lakṣmī, "Lakshmi as goddess of grain"): Giver of agricultural wealth.[3]Gaja Lakshmi (Sanskrit: गज लक्ष्मी, Gaja Lakṣmī, "Elephant Lakshmi"): Giver of animal wealth, like cattle and elephants.[3] Swami Chidananda interprets Gaja Lakshmi as giver of power of royalty.[4] According to Hindu mythology, Gaja Lakshmi brought back the wealth lost by Indra (king of demi-gods) from the ocean.[2] Vasudha Narayanan interpret the name as "one who is worshipped by elephants".[1]Santana Lakshmi (Sanskrit: सन्तान लक्ष्मी, Santāna Lakṣmī, "Progeny Lakshmi"): Bestower of offspring[3]Veera Lakshmi (Sanskrit: वीर लक्ष्मी, vīra lakṣmī, "Valourous Lakshmi") or Dhairya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धैर्य लक्ष्मी, Dhairya Lakṣmī, "Courage Lakshmi"): Bestower of valour in battles[3] and courage and strength for overcoming difficulties in life.[2]Vijaya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: विजय लक्ष्मी, Vijaya Lakṣmī, "Victorious Lakshmi") or Jaya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: जय लक्ष्मी, Jaya Lakṣmī, "Victorious Lakshmi"):[4] Giver of victory, not only in battles[3] but also in conquering hurdles in order to beget success.[2]Vidya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: विद्या लक्ष्मी, Vidyā Lakṣmī, "Knowledge Lakshmi"): the bestower of knowledge of arts and sciences[4]In some Ashta Lakshmi lists, other forms of Lakshmi are included:Aishwarya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: ऐश्वर्य लक्ष्मी, "Prosperity Lakshmi") : Goddess of riches[3]Saubhagya (Sanskrit: सौभग्य लक्ष्मी , "Giver of good Fortune") : Giver of prosperity in general.[4]Rajya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: राज्य लक्ष्मी, Rājya Lakṣmī, "Royal Lakshmi"): "She who blesses rulers (with secular power)"[5]Vara Lakshmi (Sanskrit: वर लक्ष्मी, Vara Lakṣmī, "Boon Lakshmi"): "The lady who bestows beautiful Boons".[5]

Name: LAWDOC_LAWOFFICE
Title: Very powerful temple - All your wishes fullfills
Review: I visit this temple quite often. This temple is very powerful as the name of the Godess are "Asta (8) Laxmi Temples" all your wishes get fullfilled when you visit. I had my first office in Green Hills Colony in the year 2001 by the grace of this god now I am well settelled in life with good family, health and happiness without looking back :-)

Name: BRKanth
Title: Only Asta Lakshmi Temple
Review: This is one of the greatest lakshmi temple in Hyd. One should visit this place during Navratri. Neatly maintained and ample parking which is good.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: It is beautiful Temple. In this temple there are Eight Goddess temples separately. It is place where we can get Peace with blessings.

Name: Prasad B
Title: Simple and spiritual
Review: Simple and spiritual place with state of art architecture.Its currently under renovation and soon expected to get even better.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Holy place of Goddess Laxmi in DSNR
Review: ashtalakhmi temple in Dilsukhnagar is Holy place of Goddess Laxmi with great maintenance and centrally located in houses surrounded.the major thing that need to specify here is that its maintenace..

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of ashtalakshmi temple
Review: Very big temple near to Dilsuknagar, We can see the temple with very much rush as it is situated in the busy area

Name: Krishnan S
Title: Darshan of 8 Lakhmi Deities at One Place.....Very Holy.
Review: 12 KM from the Centre of the City of Hyderabad, well designed and constructed on a elevated place. neatly maintained and Daily Pooj is performed as per the Hindu Pooja rituals, Located in the Midst of the Residential Locality, ample car parking and easy accesible from the main road by Autos and Share autos. The Steps to climb are well designed even for the elders / aged to climb. good resting places are there near Sanctum after darshan, water arrangements are there for drinking. daily distribution of the Prasadam are happening without fail.Good to visit on Saturdays and Sundays...being the Women deity the Tuesdays and Fridays are normally crowded. on festival days will take minimum of 30 to 40 minutes time to complete thre darshan.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Holy Place
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple  loacated near to kothapet in surroundings of LB nagar and Dilsukh Nagar is maintained by Kanchi trust.the maintenance and poojas performed in a traditional way were very good.

Name: sarvesh4u
Title: Devine Place
Review: Ashtalakshmi Temple is popular destination in a busy and crowded place and yet so calm and devine.  Peaceful time in place of goddess Lakshmi is really appreciable.

Name: KalyanSamrajyam
Title: nice place to visit
Review: idêal time is early mornings or late evenings...properly maintained temple premises.small parking area

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Best Temple Near Kothapet
Review: This Temple is located in Kothapet and is very crowded on Fridays.We visited this Temple on Thursday at Noon and there were around 100 devotees inside the temple.It took us a total of 30 minutes for the whole Darshan.Photography is not allowed inside the Main temple where you can see Balaji Idol in the center and surrounding him are the eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi in Idols.After the Darshan you can get free Prasad which was very good.Also three forms of Prasad is sold here: Laddu,Pulihoora and Wada which all are priced Rs.10.The Environment was very pleasant and outside the temple there is also a Marriage Hall.

Name: rkkoya
Title: Very popular among ladies
Review: This temple is popular among ladies. always full with public well maintained. Does not have enough parking space.

Name: superb114
Title: place for worship
Review: nice place for worship really pleasant environment visited the place several times and it will be crowded in some part of the days

Name: TEJAVATH
Title: Asthalakshmi Temple
Review: This temple is very good and so many visitors came to this temple and pray the god.The temple is famous in LB nagar area.

Name: superb114
Title: Pleasant Temple
Review: Really a beautiful temple with pleasant environment for worship of goddess lakshmi temple and it will fully crowded on fridays and sundays

Name: sudheerg08
Title: Peace of mind guaranteed!!!
Review: First weekend of this month I visited along with my wife and my two kids aged seven years and five years old.We can find the address of this temple easily. Astalakshmi temple arch is located on the main road towards dilsukhnagar to L.B nagar besides more super market. The location of this temple is in vasavi colony. Opposit to the temple there is big open plot converted to free parking place by the temple authority. I parked my car in the place provided. We washed our legs and entered in the temple.When we entered the temple our hearts filled spiritual power and silence, thanks to Goddess Astalaxmi. Our children also very much enjoyed and meditated for half an hour. Photograpy inside the temple is prohibited, so we took the photographs on stairs. My children are really enjoyed. I surpriced to my childrens behaviour in the temple, generally they are very talkative at home and when we are shopping, but when we enter in the temple, there minds filled with spiritual power, they are completely silent, maybe the environment in the temple.We stayed there for two hours and went back to home with peace of mind heartfully and decided to come every weekend.Thanks n regardsSudheer.G8885559150

Name: aarti_rele
Title: Excellent temple made in Marble
Review: We visited this temple. Felt good to see Hindu temple in Hyderabad which was ruled by Muslim Nizams & Nawabs & their generations. The temple is extremely well maintained.

Name: Kondraju Y
Title: Ashta Lakshmi temple - Kothapet
Review: This is very famous temple. All avatars of Lakshmi place in one area we can find differentiate the Avatars in the temple. Pleasant temple and glow in the faces of each idol of lakshmi

Name: SrilathaVemula
Title: A must see place at Kothapeta
Review: The temple looks very beautiful with eight lakshmi idols -  Adi lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhanya Lakshmi, Dhairya Lakshmi, Santana Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi, Vidya Lakshmi and Vijaya Lakshmi. The trees and plants in the temple give a pleasant and happy mood to all the people going in and coming out.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: The divine of godesses ashtalakshmi temple

Name: Narasimha Prasad G
Title: Rich Temple
Review: This temple located on Vijayawada Road ,very beautiful constructed by marble  and well maintained .I prefer you to visit this temple in late evening time

Name: Praveen K
Title: Landmark in itself
Review: The LAkshmi temple is a landmark in itself in the busy Dilsukhnagar Area. The temple offers a peaceful darshan of goddess of wealth - Lakshmi devi. The various avatars of Ammavaru are at one palce.

Name: Haokip
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Ashta Lakshmi Temple is also one of the nice temple in hyderabad, mainly Hindus loved them very much as well as every people living aroung, and also worth seeing for all travellers.

Name: Sriram K
Title: One of Hyderabad's crowing jewels and a fantastic Temple
Review: we have been visiting Temple since it was first constructed and love it each time we go. However the crowd has quadrapuled over the past 10 yrs and hence its better that anyone wanting to enjoy this place spiritually should visit it during very early hours in the mornings i.e. 6.30 or so. But the idols are breathtaking and the temple is quite clean despite thousands thronging in this place especially on Fridays!!

Name: Rohitflies
Title: Serene atmosphere
Review: The temple premises are very well maintained and one can spend peaceful time just by sitting on the stairs and relaxing.

Name: dr_vinaynenavath
Title: Peaceful n spiritual
Review: Astha Lakshmi temple a huge temple in vansathalipuram. many devotees visit this place on fridays. this temple is maintained well and clean n neat. good time is to visit in evenings. temple is big n we can sit here peacefully in evening hear the mantras in temple which will be soothing to ears n relax the mind

Name: Tnv K
Title: Place of Divinity
Review: Here is a place where you can find all eight forms of Laxmi Devi are found. Temple is located in a very peaceful locality with good connectivity.

Name: Robin A
Title: Good, peaceful temple
Review: One of must see temple if you are in this area of hyderabad or living in Hydrebad.Teample is very peaceful and calm, offering worship goddess lakshmi.Goddess have 8 avatars here. Entrance is free.

Name: Plan H
Title: peaful temple in hyderabad
Review: one the best temples i have ever saw in hyderabad. the santity and the divine blessings are the great in the temple. one should try to visit it.

Name: plan41
Title: Benediction from the Goddess of Wealth in Eight Different Forms
Review: Laxmi and I have been wanting to visit this most beautiful Temple but we could not make it till today...Laxmi had been there earlier, though. The Temple is located off Dilsukhnagar and Kothapet Fruit and Vegetable Wholesale Market, inside a locality called Vasavi nagar, off the Hyderabad-Suryapet-Vijayawada National Highway and easily approachable. The Municipal address is: Plot No.52-55, Vasavi Colony, Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad- 500 035, The Temple is administered by the Sri Kanchi Kaamakoti Peetham of Kaanchipuram, Tamil Nadu.This beautiful Temple is in the midst of a sprawling complex that is maintained very well - absolutely neat and clean and inpires instant awe and appreciation. At the entry is a beautiful and blissful Ganapati (The Lord Controller of obstacles) and then the Garudaalwar - the Golden Eagle being the Divine Vehicle of Lord Sri Mahaa Vishnu and Sri Mahaa Lakshmi, His Divine Consort - ever present with Him and residing on His beautiful and adorable, spacious Chest. However, here, She is worshipped in eight different forms, known as: (1) Sri Aadi Lakshmi (the Prime Divine Consort of the Lord of Preservation - Lord Sri Mahaa Vishnu (2) Sri Dhaanya Lakshmi (the Goddess of Food Grains) (3) Sri Dhairya Lakshmi (the Goddess of Strength and Courage (4) Sri Gaja Lakshmi (the Goddess adored by the Divine Elephants (5) Sri Santaana Lakshmi (the Goddess of Progeny) (6) Sri Vijaya Lakshmi (the Goddess of Success) (7) Sri Vidyaa Lakshmi (the Goddess of Learning and Knowledge), and (8) Sri Aishwarya Lakshmi (the Goddess of Wealth and Splendour).There is no entry fee, but special services are offered at varying  prices - depending upon the type of service desired. There are ordinarily no crowds but on festive occasions and Fridays there will be considerable rush. There is a lot of circulation space inside the Temple. The consecrated food ( "Prasaadam") is offered for sale within the complex.One must visit it to see the most beautifully and gaily decorated idols of the Lord and the Goddess in Her Eight Divine, Blissful Forms.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: An spiritual retreat
Review: A peaceful and well maintained temple with all the eight forms of goddess lakshmi in the same arena. The deities look good and a feel of goodness surrounds the temple.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: a birthday sojourn
Review: A well maintained temple with all the eight forms of goddess lakshmi in the same arena. With calm atmosphere the temple looks  peaceful

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: must see temple in Hyd....
Review: Sriman narayan and adhi lakshmi temple....  with astaa lakshmi devi vigrahaas are also present..... Ganesh Temple at the Entrance is present.... Free Entrance.... 51/- Rs for Asta Lakshmi Archna...

Name: Harshith358
Title: Perfectly Maintained Temple
Review: The design of the temple is so perfectly planned. This is a very good place to enhance your spiritual feelings.

Name: Kaiz_sm
Title: Snow World Park
Review: Traveled solo. Concept is nice but the place inside is too small. Could have expanded it a bit more. One needs to stand in a queue to collect jackets, shoes & socks that one needs to wear before entering the main area.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Excellent Temple
Review: Ashta Lakshmi Temple, located at Vasavi Colony, R K Puram, Hyderabad is one of the finest temples, not only in the twin cities of Hyderabad & Secunderabad but in the State of Telangana & Andhra Pradesh. The main Deity is Goddess Mahalakshmi  with Lord Srimannarayana surrounded by Seven other Lakshmis namely Goddess Santana Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhaanya Lakshmi, Vijaya Lakshmi, Ishwarya Lakshmi and Veera Lakshmi.This temple is on a small hillock. As we climb the steps, we reach Ganapathi temple and as we walk few yards, we reach the main temple. Lord Garuda is placed just opposite to Lord Srimannarayana. The white structure of the temple gives a grand look when illuminated in the night.Yagna shala is situated just opposite to the temple in a huge premises and daily havan takes place. Abhisekam is performed to Goddess Mahalakshmi and Srimannarayana every Friday between 6.30 AM to 8.00 AM. A visit to the temple is a must for everyone.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Great Temple
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple has become one of the prime attractions of Hyderabad & Secunderabad. Located at Vasavi Colony, between Dilsukhnagar and L B Nagar, it is a must visit temple. The main Deity is Mahalakshmi with Lord Srimannarayana followed by deities of Santana Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhaanya Lakshmi, Vijaya lakshmi, Ishwarya lakshmi and Veera Lakshmi. At the entrance, there is Lord Ganesh. Opposite to the temple, there is yagna Shala where 'Havan is performed daily.The view of the temple gives a grand look. It is situated on a small hillock.  In the evening when illuminated, it gives a look of Marble construction..
